content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of a Furnace at position (60.0, -60.0) with fuel {'coal': 40} and status EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS.

### Inserter 1 at position (60.5, -61.5)
Consists of a BurnerInserter at position (60.5, -61.5) with fuel {'coal': 47} and status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION.

### Inserter 2 at position (61.5, -61.5)
Consists of a BurnerInserter at position (61.5, -61.5) with fuel {'coal': 19} and status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS.

### Inserter 3 at position (62.5, -60.5)
Consists of a BurnerInserter at position (62.5, -60.5) with no fuel and status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Chest at position (62.5, -61.5)
Consists of a Wooden Chest at position (62.5, -61.5) with an empty inventory.

### Offshore Pump at position (107.5, -33.5)
Consists of an Offshore Pump at position (107.5, -33.5) with a fluid box containing water.

### Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0)
Consists of a Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0) with no fuel and status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Steam Engine at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of a Steam Engine at position (117.5, -30.5) with status EntityStatus.NOT_CONNECTED.

### Pipe Group 1
Consists of a group of pipes connecting the Offshore Pump to the Boiler.

### Pipe Group 2
Consists of a group of pipes connecting the Boiler to the Steam Engine.

### Electricity Group
Consists of a small electric pole at position (119.5, -30.5) with voltage 0.

### ERROR TIPS
* Errors when connecting pipes: Ensure that the entities are close enough to each other and that there are no obstacles in the way.
* Errors when using inserters: Make sure that the inserter has enough fuel and that the destination is not blocked.
* Errors when using the offshore pump: Ensure that the pump is connected to a boiler or other entity that can accept the fluid output.
* Errors when using the boiler: Ensure that the boiler has enough fuel and that it is connected to a steam engine or other entity that can accept the steam output.
* Errors when using the steam engine: Ensure that the engine is connected to a power source and that it has enough fluid input.

### NAMESPACE
* connect_entities function: failed to connect pipe from offshore pump to boiler due to nil value.
* Important variables:
	+ transport-belt: 8
	+ small-electric-pole: 1
	+ pipe: 20
	+ stone-furnace: 1
	+ wood: 7
	+ iron-ore: 6
	+ copper-ore: 20
	+ iron-plate: 613
	+ copper-plate: 5
	+ copper-cable: 2
	+ iron-gear-wheel: 2
